subclassFeature.name: The Mysticshift Duelist
entries: Originating from the elite Cassius recon groups, Mysticshift Duelists blend emerging scientific insights and a deepening arcane understanding, born from a world where the weave of magic is unraveling. These pioneers of martial and mystical arts integrated newfound arcane knowledge into their combat techniques, crafting a refined martial art that harmonizes elemental forces with physical prowess. Over the years, their practices spread beyond Cassius, evolving into a distinguished discipline. Today, Mysticshift Duelists are renowned warriors who embody the art of transformation, leveraging elemental stances to dynamically adapt in combat. Their path demands a profound comprehension of both the elements and one's inner self, attracting those intrigued by the challenge of mastering such versatile and potent powers.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Stance Initiation
entries: {@i 3rd-level Mysticshift Duelist feature}

Starting 3rd level, you gain the ability to enter elemental stances, each enhancing your attacks in unique ways. Repeated attacks made while in the same stance grants additional effects based on the number of successful attacks made. Choose two stances when you get this feature.
You may choose an additional stance when you reach the 7th, 10th and 15th level in this class.

entries.caption: Stances
rows: Attacks cause the target to shed light, reducing their stealth.
A fiery explosion occurs on hit, dealing AoE fire damage to enemies within 5 feet of the target.
Ground within 5 feet becomes difficult terrain.
Encase a hit enemy in ice, stunning them for 1 turn.
Generate a gust with each attack, pushing enemies back.
Attacks grant advantage on the next skill check or saving throw.
Summon a localized storm on hit, causing lightning damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
Cause a minor earthquake to knock nearby enemies prone and deal damage.
Devour essence, severely weakening or possibly killing a low-health enemy outright.
Illuminate targets, granting advantage on attacks against them.
A radiant burst blinds all enemies within a 10-foot radius.
Attacks generate a lift, allowing you to leap or dodge freely.
Create a vortex, pulling enemies toward you or scattering them away.
Attacks plant seeds of entanglement, slowing enemies.
Sprout thorny vines on hit, grappling the enemy.
A massive vine burst entangles all enemies within a 10-foot radius, restraining them.

subclassFeature.name: Gunblade Training
entries: {@i 3rd-level Mysticshift Duelist feature}

Upon embarking on the path of the Mysticshift Duelist, you commit to mastering the art of combat through both traditional weaponry and the precise application of firearms. This unique synthesis of martial disciplines forms the foundation of your journey, preparing you for the eventual creation of your signature weaponâ€”the Elemental Gunblade.

At 3rd level, you gain proficiency with one melee weapon and one firearm of your choice. These weapons become the focal point of your training, each representing one half of the duality you seek to master. Through rigorous practice, you learn to channel elemental energies into every strike and shot, laying the groundwork for the fusion of these disciplines.
